[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Includes all Spidercamp dog releases. Will be updated with additional breeds as they are released.
[h1]Features (vary per breed):[/h1] Advanced trainability Cold-hardy breeds Larger breeds can be used to carry weight in caravans Some breeds have strong melee to assist with protection and hunting
[h1]Included Breeds:[/h1] Afghan Hound Border Collie Borzoi Bull Mastiff Bull Terrier Caucasian Shepherd Chow Chow Collie Doberman Golden Retriever Greyhound Old English Sheepdog Saint Bernard Standard Poodle Miniature Schnauzer Miniature Dachshund Newfoundland Pug Welsh Corgi
[h1]Additional Features:[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2108362126] Animals Are Fun[/url] The best part about owning dogs is hanging out with them. Revolus has made a mod that lets your colonists reap the rewards of pet ownership including: -Playing fetch -Going on bff walks -Gaining animal handling skill the more they hang out with their 4 legged pals
[strike][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2101205559] Animals sleep in bed[/url] Revolus claps back at loneliness and discomfort with this mod which lets dogs sleep in beds just like they deserve.[/strike] Not updated but can be achieved with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1966744871]Invisible Animal Beds[/url]-mod instead.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2441132298] Dogs Mate[/url] As if the first two weren't enough, Revolus hits us with a third instant classic which lets different dog breeds breed and have puppies. The liters will be half mom's breed, half dad's breed.
[b]A DOG SAID[/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1550059802] A Dog Said Patch, kindly made by @Cypress[/url] (I haven't tested this functionality in a few releases. If it's broken and someone wants to fix it, I'll happily take your fixes and upload here.)
[b]Use as battle mount or as a mount in caravans - Giddy-Up by roolo:[/b] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1216999901] Giddy-Up Core [/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1217001091] Giddy-Up Combat[/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1253251478] Giddy-Up Caravan [/url]
----------------------------------------------------------
If you subscribe to this release you don't need to subscribe to the individual breed releases. If you were previously using the individual breed mods, you can substitute this one in to a current save and disable the individual subscriptions.
[b]For instance[/b] - You have the following enabled: Collie Golden Retriver
You subscribe to Spidercamp's Dog Pack.
You disable Collie Golden Retriver
You enable Spidercamp's Dog Pack
--------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]If you encounter any bugs:[/b]
Please note - this mod is about as close to the vanilla game as you can get. Many of the bugs reported in the comments cannot be recreated when using vanilla + this mod only. Before commenting about a bug, please test with only this mod enabled and see if you're able to recreate. Any bugs that exist in the vanilla version will carry over to this mod.
B18 version available here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/eb11z2nnebknko5/AAB3Quyx8V11DPv_OlF4s1wTa?dl=0 B19 version available here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ck625r0tl4cmcuo/AAD_rcm_WSlJYR_rKND_azJXa?dl=0
